description:
Komatsu and Hatta see Kyosuke teleport and alter their student film to try to capture it on video, which would mean it`s time to move for Kyosuke.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adios Kyosuke! Paranormal Powers Caught on Video!
Saraba Kyousuke! Video ni Utsutta Chounouryoku
さらば恭介! ビデオに写った超能力
